,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE45,24,24))) AS TVALUE45, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE46,24,24))) AS TVALUE46 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE47,24,24))) AS TVALUE47, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE48,24,24))) AS TVALUE48 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE49,24,24))) AS TVALUE49, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE50,24,24))) AS TVALUE50 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE51,24,24))) AS TVALUE51, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE52,24,24))) AS TVALUE52 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE53,24,24))) AS TVALUE53, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE54,24,24))) AS TVALUE54 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE55,24,24))) AS TVALUE55
,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE68,24,24))) AS TVALUE68 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE69,24,24))) AS TVALUE69, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE70,24,24))) AS TVALUE70 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE71,24,24))) AS TVALUE71, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE72,24,24))) AS TVALUE72 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE73,24,24))) AS TVALUE73, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE74,24,24))) AS TVALUE74 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE75,24,24))) AS TVALUE75, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE76,24,24))) AS TVALUE76 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE77,24,24))) AS TVALUE77, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE78,24,24))) AS TVALUE78 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE79,24,24))) AS TVALUE79, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE80,24,24))) AS TVALUE80 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE81,24,24))) AS TVALUE81, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE82,24,24))) AS TVALUE82 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE83,24,24))) AS TVALUE83, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE84,24,24))) AS TVALUE84 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE85,24,24))) AS TVALUE85, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE86,24,24))) AS TVALUE86 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE87,24,24))) AS TVALUE87, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE88,24,24))) AS TVALUE88 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE89,24,24))) AS TVALUE89, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE90,24,24))) AS TVALUE90 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE91,24,24))) AS TVALUE91, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE92,24,24))) AS TVALUE92 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE93,24,24))) AS TVALUE93, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE94,24,24))) AS TVALUE94 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE95,24,24))) AS TVALUE95, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE96,24,24))) AS TVALUE96 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE97,24,24))) AS TVALUE97, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE98,24,24))) AS TVALUE98 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE99,24,24))) AS TVALUE99, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE100,24,24))) AS TVALUE100
FROM LOG_${hogi}DCC_TREND WHERE SCANTIME = '${startDate}' AND Seq in ( SELECT C.TBLNO FROM MST_GrpTag B, MST_TAG_DCC C WHERE B.HOGI = C.IHOGI
AND B.ISEQ = C.ISEQ
AND B.YSEQ = C.ISEQ
AND B.Gubun = 'D' AND B.GrpHOGI = #{hogi} AND B.ID = #{grpId} AND B.MenuNo = #{menuNo} AND B.GrpNo = #{grpNo} GROUP BY TBLNO )

SELECT ${tblNo} SEQ, SCANTIME
,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE1,24,24))) AS TVALUE1, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE2,24,24))) AS TVALUE2 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE3,24,24))) AS TVALUE3, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE4,24,24))) AS TVALUE4 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE5,24,24))) AS TVALUE5, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE6,24,24))) AS TVALUE6 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE7,24,24))) AS TVALUE7, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE8,24,24))) AS TVALUE8 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE9,24,24))) AS TVALUE9, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE10,24,24))) AS TVALUE10 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE11,24,24))) AS TVALUE11, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE12,24,24))) AS TVALUE12 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE13,24,24))) AS TVALUE13, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE14,24,24))) AS TVALUE14 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE15,24,24))) AS TVALUE15, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE16,24,24))) AS TVALUE16 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE17,24,24))) AS TVALUE17, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE18,24,24))) AS TVALUE18 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE19,24,24))) AS TVALUE19, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE20,24,24))) AS TVALUE20 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE21,24,24))) AS TVALUE21, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE22,24,24))) AS TVALUE22 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE23,24,24))) AS TVALUE23, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE24,24,24))) AS TVALUE24 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE25,24,24))) AS TVALUE25, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE26,24,24))) AS TVALUE26 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE27,24,24))) AS TVALUE27, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE28,24,24))) AS TVALUE28
,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE1,24,24))) AS TVALUE1, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE2,24,24))) AS TVALUE2 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE3,24,24))) AS TVALUE3, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE4,24,24))) AS TVALUE4 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE5,24,24))) AS TVALUE5, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE6,24,24))) AS TVALUE6 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE7,24,24))) AS TVALUE7, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE8,24,24))) AS TVALUE8 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE9,24,24))) AS TVALUE9, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE10,24,24))) AS TVALUE10 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE11,24,24))) AS TVALUE11, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE12,24,24))) AS TVALUE12 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE13,24,24))) AS TVALUE13, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE14,24,24))) AS TVALUE14 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE15,24,24))) AS TVALUE15, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE16,24,24))) AS TVALUE16 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE17,24,24))) AS TVALUE17, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE18,24,24))) AS TVALUE18 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE19,24,24))) AS TVALUE19, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE20,24,24))) AS TVALUE20 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE21,24,24))) AS TVALUE21, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE22,24,24))) AS TVALUE22 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE23,24,24))) AS TVALUE23, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE24,24,24))) AS TVALUE24 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE25,24,24))) AS TVALUE25, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE26,24,24))) AS TVALUE26 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE27,24,24))) AS TVALUE27, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE28,24,24))) AS TVALUE28 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE29,24,24))) AS TVALUE29, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE30,24,24))) AS TVALUE30 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE31,24,24))) AS TVALUE31, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE32,24,24))) AS TVALUE32 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE33,24,24))) AS TVALUE33, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE34,24,24))) AS TVALUE34 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE35,24,24))) AS TVALUE35, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE36,24,24))) AS TVALUE36
,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE1,24,24))) AS TVALUE1, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE2,24,24))) AS TVALUE2 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE3,24,24))) AS TVALUE3, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE4,24,24))) AS TVALUE4 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE5,24,24))) AS TVALUE5, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE6,24,24))) AS TVALUE6 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE7,24,24))) AS TVALUE7, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE8,24,24))) AS TVALUE8 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE9,24,24))) AS TVALUE9, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE10,24,24))) AS TVALUE10 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE11,24,24))) AS TVALUE11, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE12,24,24))) AS TVALUE12 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE13,24,24))) AS TVALUE13, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE14,24,24))) AS TVALUE14 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE15,24,24))) AS TVALUE15, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE16,24,24))) AS TVALUE16 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE17,24,24))) AS TVALUE17, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE18,24,24))) AS TVALUE18 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE19,24,24))) AS TVALUE19, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE20,24,24))) AS TVALUE20 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE21,24,24))) AS TVALUE21, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE22,24,24))) AS TVALUE22 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE23,24,24))) AS TVALUE23, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE24,24,24))) AS TVALUE24 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE25,24,24))) AS TVALUE25, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE26,24,24))) AS TVALUE26 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE27,24,24))) AS TVALUE27, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE28,24,24))) AS TVALUE28 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE29,24,24))) AS TVALUE29, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE30,24,24))) AS TVALUE30 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE31,24,24))) AS TVALUE31, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE32,24,24))) AS TVALUE32 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE33,24,24))) AS TVALUE33, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE34,24,24))) AS TVALUE34 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE35,24,24))) AS TVALUE35, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE36,24,24))) AS TVALUE36 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE37,24,24))) AS TVALUE37, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE38,24,24))) AS TVALUE38 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE39,24,24))) AS TVALUE39, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE40,24,24))) AS TVALUE40 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE41,24,24))) AS TVALUE41, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE42,24,24))) AS TVALUE42 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE43,24,24))) AS TVALUE43, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE44,24,24))) AS TVALUE44 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE45,24,24))) AS TVALUE45, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE46,24,24))) AS TVALUE46 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE47,24,24))) AS TVALUE47, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE48,24,24))) AS TVALUE48 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE49,24,24))) AS TVALUE49, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE50,24,24))) AS TVALUE50 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE51,24,24))) AS TVALUE51, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE52,24,24))) AS TVALUE52 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE53,24,24))) AS TVALUE53, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE54,24,24))) AS TVALUE54 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE55,24,24))) AS TVALUE55, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE56,24,24))) AS TVALUE56 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE57,24,24))) AS TVALUE57, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE58,24,24))) AS TVALUE58 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE59,24,24))) AS TVALUE59, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE60,24,24))) AS TVALUE60 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE61,24,24))) AS TVALUE61, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE62,24,24))) AS TVALUE62 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE63,24,24))) AS TVALUE63, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE64,24,24))) AS TVALUE64 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE65,24,24))) AS TVALUE65, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE66,24,24))) AS TVALUE66 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE67,24,24))) AS TVALUE67
,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE68,24,24))) AS TVALUE68 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE69,24,24))) AS TVALUE69, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE70,24,24))) AS TVALUE70 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE71,24,24))) AS TVALUE71, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE72,24,24))) AS TVALUE72 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE73,24,24))) AS TVALUE73, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE74,24,24))) AS TVALUE74 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE75,24,24))) AS TVALUE75, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE76,24,24))) AS TVALUE76 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE77,24,24))) AS TVALUE77, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE78,24,24))) AS TVALUE78 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE79,24,24))) AS TVALUE79, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE80,24,24))) AS TVALUE80 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE81,24,24))) AS TVALUE81, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE82,24,24))) AS TVALUE82 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE83,24,24))) AS TVALUE83, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE84,24,24))) AS TVALUE84 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE85,24,24))) AS TVALUE85, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE86,24,24))) AS TVALUE86 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE87,24,24))) AS TVALUE87, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE88,24,24))) AS TVALUE88 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE89,24,24))) AS TVALUE89, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE90,24,24))) AS TVALUE90 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE91,24,24))) AS TVALUE91, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE92,24,24))) AS TVALUE92 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE93,24,24))) AS TVALUE93, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE94,24,24))) AS TVALUE94 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE95,24,24))) AS TVALUE95, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE96,24,24))) AS TVALUE96 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE97,24,24))) AS TVALUE97, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE98,24,24))) AS TVALUE98 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE99,24,24))) AS TVALUE99, RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(TVALUE100,24,24))) AS TVALUE100
FROM LOG_${hogi}DCC_TREND${tblNo} WHERE
SCANTIME > DATEADD(SECOND,-5,'${startDate}') AND SCANTIME <= '${startDate}'
SCANTIME = '${scanTime}'

SELECT C.iSeq AS iSeq, ISNULL(BSCAL,'') AS bscal, ISNULL(LOOPNAME,'') AS loopName, ISNULL(CASE UNIT WHEN 'G:SEC' THEN 'G/S' WHEN 'KG:HR' THEN 'KG/HR' WHEN 'L:MIN' THEN 'L/MIN' WHEN 'L:SEC' THEN 'L/S' WHEN 'M3:HR' THEN 'M3/H' WHEN 'ML:S' THEN 'ML/S' WHEN 'DECADE' THEN 'DEC' WHEN 'FP:HR' THEN 'FP/HR' WHEN 'VOLTS' THEN 'V' WHEN 'DEGC:H' THEN 'DEGC/H' WHEN 'M:MIN' THEN 'M/MIN' WHEN 'MM:HR' THEN 'MM/HR' WHEN 'MM:SEC' THEN 'MM/S' WHEN 'MW:MIN' THEN 'MW/MIN' WHEN 'METERS' THEN 'M' WHEN 'METRES' THEN 'M' WHEN 'MS:M' THEN 'MSIE/M' WHEN 'US:M' THEN 'USIE/M' WHEN 'CI:M3' THEN 'CI/M3' WHEN 'DEC:S' THEN 'DEC/S' WHEN 'KCNT:M' THEN 'KCNT/M' WHEN 'KCNT:S' THEN 'KCNT/S' WHEN 'MCI:M3' THEN 'MCI/M3' WHEN 'MGY:HR' THEN 'mGy/hr' WHEN 'MGY/HR' THEN 'mGy/hr' WHEN 'MILLIK' THEN 'MK' WHEN 'MR:HR' THEN 'MREM/H' WHEN 'R:HR' THEN 'REM/H' WHEN 'DEGC' THEN '°C' WHEN 'DEG C' THEN '°C' WHEN 'LD:LG' THEN 'KD/LAG' WHEN 'NOTAVL' THEN 'N/A' WHEN 'PERU' THEN 'P.U.' ELSE UNIT END,'') AS unit, ISNULL(LIMIT1,'-32768') AS limit1, ISNULL(LIMIT2,'-32768') AS limit2, ISNULL(TYPE,0) AS type, ISNULL(IOTYPE,'') AS ioType, ADDRESS AS address, ISNULL(IOBIT,'') AS ioBit, ISNULL(C.TBLNO,'-32768') AS tblNo, ISNULL(FLDNO,'-32768') AS fldNo, ISNULL(SaveCoreChk,0) AS SaveCoreChk, ISNULL(C.Descr,'') AS descr, ISNULL(B.Descr,'') AS dataLoop, GrpHogi AS grpHogi, ISNULL(B.MinVal,0) AS minVal, ISNULL(B.MaxVal,100) AS maxVal, Hogi AS hogi, XYGubun AS xyGubun, ISNULL(ELOW,0) AS eLow, ISNULL(EHIGH,0) AS eHigh, ISNULL(VLOW,0) AS vLow, ISNULL(VHIGH,0) AS vHigh, FASTIOCHK AS fastIoChk, ISNULL((SELECT FLDNO FROM MST_TAG_DCC WHERE IHOGI = B.HOGI AND ADDRESS = C.ADDRESS AND IOTYPE IN ('FTAI','FTDT') AND FASTIOCHK = C.FASTIOCHK),FLDNO) AS fldNoFast FROM MST_GrpTag B, MST_TAG_DCC C WHERE B.HOGI = C.IHOGI
AND B.ISEQ = C.ISEQ
AND B.YSEQ = C.ISEQ
AND B.Gubun = 'D' AND B.GrpHOGI = #{hogi} AND B.ID = #{grpId} AND B.MenuNo = #{menuNo} AND B.GrpNo = #{grpNo} ORDER BY B.TagNo

SELECT ISEQ, IHOGI, XYGUBUN, LOOPNAME, IOTYPE, ADDRESS, IOBIT, DESCR FROM MST_TAG_DCC WHERE IHOGI = #{txtHogi} AND (ADDRESS like '${searchStr}%'
OR LOOPNAME like '%${searchStr}%'
OR DESCR like '%${searchStr}%'
) ORDER BY ISEQ
